column1: '''Rufus Burrows''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].
Rufus married [[Asphodel Brandybuck]], and had one child, [[Milo Burrows
column3: Bilbo's Birthday Party]] along with Milo's children.<ref>{{App

column2: Rufus]] is a Latin name meaning "red-haired".<ref>[[Jim Allan]], ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
